name: mikroe.click.ltecat13ex
short_description: LTE Cat.1 3 Click (for Europe) is a compact add-on board for reliable 4G wireless communication. This board features the EG91EXGA-128-SGNS, an LTE Cat 1 IoT module that meets the 3GPP Release 11 standard from Quectel. It supports multiple wireless standards, including LTE-FDD, WCDMA, and GSM, ensuring broad network compatibility. Key features include multi-band LTE support (B1/B3/B7/B8/B20/B28), RX diversity for bands B1 and B8, and multi-constellation GNSS (GPS, GLONASS, BeiDou/Compass, Galileo, QZSS). It also integrates a 16-bit mono audio codec for voice functionality with support for CTIA standard headphones.
